scripts.android: npm run build && cordova run android
scripts.android-release: npm run build && cordova build --release android && mv platforms/android/build/outputs/apk/android-release-unsigned.apk SpotApp.apk && jarsigner -verbose -sigalg SHA1withRSA -digestalg SHA1 -keystore spotapp-release-key.keystore SpotApp.apk spotapp && ./zipalign -v 4 SpotApp.apk SpotApp.apk.aligned && cp SpotApp.apk.aligned SpotApp.apk
